code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();const isActive=path=>{return location.pathname===path;};const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-text",children:"Abdelrahman Elshurbagy"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-menu ".concat(isMenuOpen?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-link ".concat(isActive('/')?'active':''),onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(false),children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/projects",className:"navbar-link ".concat(isActive('/projects')?'active':''),onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(false),children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",className:"navbar-link ".concat(isActive('/about')?'active':''),onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(false),children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"navbar-link ".concat(isActive('/contact')?'active':''),onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(false),children:"Contact"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-toggle",onClick:toggleMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bar"})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
